title: Reacts Developer || 9123687 at Diverse Lynx Dallas, TX
description:
Reacts Developer || 9123687 job at Diverse Lynx. Dallas, TX. Title: Java
Developer with ReactJs

Location: Dallas, Atlanta, Minneapolis, Chicago

Job Type: C2C



Job description:

Technical/Functional Skills
Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript
object model
Handson experience on HTML/CSS
Thorough understanding of React.js, Angular and its core principles
5+ years of experience with popular React.js/ Angular workflows (such as Flux or
Redux)
Deep understanding of Private and Public Cloud Architectures
Experience with data structure libraries (e.g., Immutable.js)
Knowledge of isomorphic React is a plus
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and GraphQL
Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools
Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM,
Yarnetc.
bility to understand business requirements and translate them into technical
requirements
Experience in UI device/browser-based test automation using Java or Javascript
with Testcafe/ Appium/ Selenium
Experience Required 7+

Roles & Responsibilities Java ReactJs Developer



Diverse Lynx LLC is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. All qualified
applicants will receive due consideration for employment without any
discrimination. All applicants will be evaluated solely on the basis of their
ability, competence and their proven capability to perform the functions
